name: @teemill/node-red-custom-product
description: This node connects Node-RED to the Teemill API, and enables you to create a flow that will take any image then put it on a t-shirt. The Node accepts images in Base64 format and will return a custom product URL where people can buy that image on a real product. It will work out of the box just for fun, or create a free Teemill account then replace the default API credentials with your own if you want to publish your project online and take a share of the profit.
author: Teemill Tech Ltd.
